about_the_game:
Welcome to Technograd




The city is yours for the taking. Do whatever it takes to rule this cyberpunk megalopolis and dominate its gangs. Plan hits, run complex extortion rings, concoct efficient money laundering schemes, traffic goods, and more! Hack into enemy networks, run infiltration covert ops, or fight your enemies head-on in direct, turn-based combat!

Choose Your Gang

Five gangs compete for control of Technograd, each with their strengths, weaknesses, special abilities, and powers. Pick your cyberpunk champion and lead them to glory as you build influence and gain control over the city’s districts.

Customize Your Gang Leader

The gang leader is an extra powerful unit that can enter direct combat alongside your army of thugs. Give them an extra edge with customizable weapons and armor, cybernetic implants to improve stats and abilities, and performance-enhancing stims to help win individual battles. Draw from a massive tech tree to discover new tactics and learn new strategies to unleash on your enemies!

Get Your Hands Dirty

Sometimes, pulling strings from the shadows won't be enough. Step into the streets and engage your enemies in direct, turn-based JRPG-inspired combat. Unleash your tactical powers onto your foes and work alongside your minions to clear the sectors of Technograd from rival gangs!

Bend The City To Your Will

Build or purchase strategic structures in Technograd's districts to unlock unique combat and economic bonuses. Resort to diplomacy to reach your objectives, keep the police in the palm of your hand, and play the game of politics to exert your influence throughout the cyberpunk metropolis!

Music collaboration from synthwave legend Waveshaper
